policies.name: Default Policy

config.code:
// by default, grants any permission associated with this policy

policies.name: Default Permission

clients.name: HSPC patient data manager SMART application

clientScopes.name: patient/*.read
clientScopes.description: SMART authorization scope for read permissions to all data of patient within context

attributes.consent.screen.text: Allow SMART application to read all of selected patient's data

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token

clientScopes.name: launch/patient
clientScopes.description: SMART standalone application patient launch context

attributes.consent.screen.text: Allow SMART application to run with a selected patient

clientScopes.name: user/Patient.read
clientScopes.description: SMART authorization scope for read permissions to all patients within user's role

attributes.consent.screen.text: Allow SMART application to read all patient demographic data
